english.title: THOUSAND PROMISE
text: everyday he promise me with a thousand promise
he swear's and say we will live forever togther
everyday he promise me with a thousand promise
he swear's and say we will live forever togther
he took me up to the stars . he made me fall in love with him
i was sleeping and wekup on his love
and one day i get up i found nobody
he made me love him he made me love him
till i saw the life in his eyes
after you loved me , why did you leave me like this
he took me up to the stars . he made me fall in love with him
i was sleeping and wekup on his love
and one day i get up i found nobody
